  Grandma said to her granddaughter, "Are you going to help me make this meal?" Her granddaughter, Jenny, replied, "Yes, I will help you!"

  Grandma and Jenny began to prepare the ingredients. Jenny was clumsy. She dropped*** the flour, cracked the eggs and spilled the milk.  Grandma smiled and said, "That's ok, Jenny. Let's just finish our meal. We need to be careful with the food."  Jenny was a bit sad. She was feeling so clumsy. Grandma noticed her daughter's disappointment and said, "It's OK, sweetheart. Let's try again. This time, I'll help you." Jenny smiled and nodded. Together, they finished making the meal.
